item.title: Ron Paul
item.description: Satoshi Roundtable IV Introduction 1 Please welcome Alex from Coin Center… Bruce’s son. My name is Alexander.. I’m the CEO of Bit….. something… I would like to introduce the … Nick Spanos. Introduction 2 Nick Spanos A while ago, I think last year, … we said it would be cool to have Ron Paul here. Bruce calls me a few months ago and says we have to get Ron down here.
